author.name: Licensed by Woolworths  ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: Try our easy to follow Blackcurrant Jelly With Vanilla Cream recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Blackcurrant Jelly With Vanilla Cream Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the jelly into small pieces and place in a measuring jug. Pour over 300ml boiling water and stir until the jelly has dissolved. Top up to 600ml with cold water or icecubes, stirring until the jelly has dissolved. Divide between 4 serving glasses and chill for at least 4 hours or overnight to set.

Put the cream, vanilla extract, and icing sugar in a bowl and whisk with an electric hand whisk until soft peaks form. Spoon the cream over the jellies, top each dessert with a mint leaf or two and a sprig of blackcurrants (if using), and serve.
